name: WallStreetBankerPlaybook
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wall street banker playbook
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Wall Street Banker Playbook shares the daily life and story of bankers in Wallstreet.

The author of the book Precisely How to Live: A Wall Street Banker's Playbook for Success, Values, and Joy, Soojin Park shares his passion, industry stories, and the way of life of bankers in Wallstreet on your smart speakers.

[How to use]
You can say, “Alexa, open Wall Street Banker Playbook” to hear the latest stories. While listening to a story, you can say ”Alexa, stop” to stop the story. You can continue to the next story by answering “Yes” to the question “Would you like to read the next post?"

Example phrase:
"Alexa, open Wall Street Banker Playbook"

[Dialogue flow]
a. The Skill will play its welcome message upon hearing the user’s command, “Alexa, open Wall Street Banker Playbook."
b. The Skill will automatically play the most recent posting from the open Wall Street Banker Playbook board from wecast.ai.
c.After playing the most recent post, the Skill will ask “Would you like to read the next post?”
- If the listener says “Yes”, the Skill will play the next posting
- If the listener says “No”, the Skill will exit the Skill
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
